game

Class Deck

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Deck

  • public class Deck
extends java.lang.Object

    Class which generates a deck

    Each card in the deck has a reference to the card below in the deck. This means that the deck is a linked list of cards.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Card cardBelow
      The card below the card at the top of the deck
      private int numCardsInDeck
      The number of carts a deck has

      private Card.Rank rank
      Random rank used when creating a new card

      Random suit used when creating a new card
      private Card topCard
      The card at the top of the deck

    • Method Detail

      • getTopCard

        public Card getTopCard()
        Returns the card at the top of the deck.
        Returns:
        The card at the top of the deck.

      • generateRandomNumbers

        private void generateRandomNumbers()
        Generates an array list with the numbers 0-51 placed in a random order. Each number in the array list maps to a unique combination of a suit and rank of a card.

      • generateDeck

        private void generateDeck()
        Generates a deck where its cards are a linked list.

      • randomizeSuitAndRank

        private void randomizeSuitAndRank(int index)
        Generates a random combination of suit and rank which has not been generated before.
        Parameters:
        index - The index in the array with random numbers.
